appDescription.message: Jaza fomu yoyote ya wavuti kwa kutumia sauti yako tu!

popup_allow_permission_btn_str.description: String on the button on popup page that allows user to navigate to permissions page

popup_allow_permission_btn_tooltip_str.message: bonyeza hapa Ruhusu Ruhusa ya Sauti

popup_help_desc_str.message: Ikiwa umepata shida yoyote, tafadhali ripoti

popup_default_language_label_str.description: label for default language on popup

popup_mic_btn_tooltip_str.message: Bonyeza hapa kuwasha / Kuzima Utambuzi wa Hotuba
popup_mic_btn_tooltip_str.description: mic button tooltip on popup page

option_onstart_setting_str.message: Anza 'Utambuzi wa Hotuba' wakati Chrome inapoanza

option_default_lang_change_setting_str.message: Badilisha Lugha ya Utambuzi wa Hotuba

option_permission_success_msg.message: Sasa unaweza kufunga kichupo hiki na utumie zana hii kuandika kwenye wavuti yoyote kwa sauti yako!
option_permission_success_msg.description: success message when user accepts permission

option_permission_error_msg.message: Tafadhali Ruhusu Ruhusa ili utumie zana hii!
option_permission_error_msg.description: error message when user rejects permission

emoji_not_found.description: message to when emoji is not found.

option_emoji_setting_str.message: Tumia agizo la emoji (zaidi ya emojis 1800)
option_emoji_setting_str.description: emoji setting label on option page

option_emoji_closest_matching_setting_st.message: Tafuta emoji ya sauti ya karibu zaidi

popup_help_how_to_use_str.description: How to use this tool ? string

command_emoji_description.message: Sema 'jina la emoji emoji' ili uweke emoji inayofanana kutoka orodha ya emoji 1800. orodha kamili ya emojis katika ukurasa wa kuweka

command_press_enter_description.message: Sema waandishi wa habari kuingia ili bonyeza kitufe cha 'Ingiza'. Muhimu kwa kuwasilisha fomu

command_newline_description_new.message: Sema laini mpya kupata laini mpya.

command_mindfulness_description.message: Sema 'uangalifu' kuingiza mawazo ya nasibu katika kisanduku cha maandishi

audio_permission_todo_label.message: Tafadhali Bonyeza kitufe hapo chini kuruhusu ruhusa za sauti ili utumie zana hii.

audio_permission_notice_info.message: Kumbuka: Ikiwa umekataa ruhusa kwa bahati mbaya, basi unaweza kuwaruhusu kubonyeza kona ya juu kushoto ya mwambaa wa utaftaji wa tabo hili

audio_permission_error_msg.message: Tafadhali Ruhusu Ruhusa ili utumie zana hii!

audio_permission_success_msg.message: Sasa unaweza kufunga kichupo hiki na utumie zana hii kuandika kwenye wavuti yoyote kwa sauti yako!

popup_mic_listening_note.message: * Sasa bonyeza bonyeza yoyote na uongee
popup_mic_listening_note.description: note to user when mic starts listening

command_arrow_description.message: Sema 'mshale kushoto' ili ubonyeze kitufe cha kushoto. amri zinazowezekana: mshale kushoto | kulia | juu | chini

command_search_description.message: Sema paka ya kutafuta au paka ya google kutafuta paka kwenye google.com

command_bookmark_description.message: Sema 'Alamisha ukurasa huu' au 'ondoa alamisho' ili kuongeza au kuondoa alamisho

command_bookmark_remove_callback_label.message: Imeondoa ukurasa huu kutoka kwa alamisho!

05B91A69_8814_3B81_1332_6F72A3862DE3.message: Sema "cheza jina la wimbo", itacheza wimbo kutoka kwa youtube.
05B91A69_8814_3B81_1332_6F72A3862DE3.description: command Say 'play song_name', it will play the song from youtube. alias

166739BA_DD4A_0FAC_8635_877B90A755FC.message: Sema 'onyesha neno kuu' kuonyesha neno kuu kwenye ukurasa wa sasa na kinyume chake
166739BA_DD4A_0FAC_8635_877B90A755FC.description: command Say 'highlight keyword' to highlight the keyword on current page and vice-verca alias

F16BC2BB_AD3E_749E_683B_560DF6F914E5.message: Sema tendua / fanya tena / tendua yote kufanya utendue / fanya tena / utendue yote.
F16BC2BB_AD3E_749E_683B_560DF6F914E5.description: command Say undo/redo/undo all to do undo/redo/undo all. alias

837C899B_2695_0944_4AB9_3F18657DAF86.message: Nenda kwenye vitu vya kuingiza kwa kusema inayofuata na ya awali
837C899B_2695_0944_4AB9_3F18657DAF86.description: command Navigate to input elements by saying next and previous alias

7025F41F_A247_2606_5EEF_EF009D666B11.message: Sema songa chini / songa juu ili kusogeza ukurasa.
7025F41F_A247_2606_5EEF_EF009D666B11.description: command Say scroll down/ scroll up to scroll the page. alias

271F0428_E067_4BEB_90D6_8117EF8E7E29.message: Sema 'nenda facebook.com' kufungua facebook.com kwenye kichupo kipya. Sema 'nenda kwenye alamisho ya jina la jina' kufungua url ya alamisho.
271F0428_E067_4BEB_90D6_8117EF8E7E29.description: command Say 'go to facebook.com' to open facebook.com in new tab. Say 'go to bookmark bookmark_name' to open bookmark url. alias

79A538B2_EC72_DB1F_02AC_5A35F75E550D.description: command Hide/Unhide the current page alias

239D85D7_8DB9_6DD6_2F9E_ED0E5D6511B9.message: kudhibiti media (sauti na video) kwenye ukurasa.
239D85D7_8DB9_6DD6_2F9E_ED0E5D6511B9.description: command control media (audio and video) on the page. alias

8DF1225E_6D10_2F85_2550_0CCACAC586BF.description: command Say 'type your_text' to type your text. alias

9410478E_01B3_3F0A_54B5_F2253DE8CCD5.message: Nakala ya kupanua maandishi. Tazama orodha ya kupanua maandishi katika mipangilio.
9410478E_01B3_3F0A_54B5_F2253DE8CCD5.description: command Text expander command. See text expand list in the settings. alias

3E34E89A_ED4E_3248_ACF1_FA162FA7C24E.message: Sema 'nambari za kuonyesha' kuonyesha viungo vilivyoangaziwa kwenye ukurasa.
3E34E89A_ED4E_3248_ACF1_FA162FA7C24E.description: command Say 'show numbers' to show links highlighted on page. alias

F4DA5D43_FA43_D572_8469_A959A0DE66CE.message: Sema 'ficha nambari' ili ufiche nambari kutoka kwa viungo kwenye ukurasa.
F4DA5D43_FA43_D572_8469_A959A0DE66CE.description: command Say 'hide numbers' to hide numbers from links on page. alias

E5FB3426_AEE3_D96A_DC5E_96E0EEF66E9F.message: Sema 'bonyeza #nambari' kubonyeza nambari ya gridi ya taifa.
E5FB3426_AEE3_D96A_DC5E_96E0EEF66E9F.description: command Say 'click #number' to to click on grid number.  alias
